Package marytts.signalproc.sinusoidal.hntm.analysis

Analysis package for harmonics plus noise speech models.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
FrameNoisePart Baseline class to represent noise part of a speech frame
 

Class Summary
FrameHarmonicPart  
FrameNoisePartLpc LPC based noise modeling for a given speech frame Full spectrum LP coefficients and LP gain are used Synthesis handles noise generation for upper frequencies(i.e.
FrameNoisePartPseudoHarmonic An alternative model for the noise part of a given speech frame.

HarmonicAndTransientAnalysisOutput  
HntmAnalyzer This class implements a harmonic+noise model for speech as described in Stylianou, Y., 1996, "Harmonic plus Noise Models for Speech, combined with Statistical Methods, for Speech and Speaker Modification", Ph.D.

Package marytts.signalproc.sinusoidal.hntm.analysis Description

Analysis package for harmonics plus noise speech models.
